Rinkside.Description: Immerse yourself in the action with seats right by the rink, offering an unparalleled game experience and the thrill of being close to the players.
Rinkside.View_Quality: Direct view of the ice for an engaging and immersive experience, perfect for the avid fan.
Rinkside.Unique_Features: Opportunities for close player interactions and the chance to be featured on the live broadcast.
Rinkside.Accessibility: Convenient access with limited mobility device space available, ensuring a comfortable experience for all fans.
Rinkside.Special_Perks: Exclusive access to premium amenities, including club areas and complimentary dining options.

Club_Seats.Description: Enjoy the game from the luxury of club seats, offering fantastic views and additional benefits for a superior spectator experience.
Club_Seats.View_Quality: Elevated side views ensuring a clear line of sight to all the action on the ice.
Club_Seats.Unique_Features: Extra legroom and more spacious seating arrangements, less crowded for comfort and convenience.
Club_Seats.Accessibility: Easily accessible with dedicated entrances and close to elevators for quick access.
Club_Seats.Special_Perks: Enjoy in-seat wait service and access to exclusive club lounges with gourmet dining options.

Center_Balcony.Description: Capture the excitement from a central balcony view, offering a panoramic perspective of the game and a strategic vantage point.
Center_Balcony.View_Quality: Broad view of the arena, ideal for fans who appreciate a tactical overview of the game.
Center_Balcony.Unique_Features: A more affordable option for fans wanting to enjoy the game with a comprehensive view.
Center_Balcony.Accessibility: Accessible seating available with elevators to the balcony level for ease of access.
Center_Balcony.Special_Perks: A budget-friendly choice without sacrificing the full experience of the atmosphere.

Loge_Level.Description: Experience the game from just above the rinkside, combining close views with a slight elevation for optimal visibility.
Loge_Level.View_Quality: Near-ice view with the advantage of elevation to oversee the game's dynamics.
Loge_Level.Unique_Features: Balances proximity to the ice with a more accessible price, ideal for enthusiastic fans.
Loge_Level.Accessibility: Features wheelchair-accessible seating and amenities located nearby for convenience.
Loge_Level.Special_Perks: Perfect for those seeking a memorable game day experience with an excellent balance of price and perspective.

restaurants_bars.name: Metropolitan Grill
restaurants_bars.description: An iconic Seattle steakhouse known for its prime beef, elegant ambiance, and extensive wine list, a favorite among locals and visitors alike.

restaurants_bars.name: The Pink Door
restaurants_bars.description: An Italian-American restaurant offering delicious cuisine, live entertainment, and a charming atmosphere in Pike Place Market.

restaurants_bars.name: Pike Brewing Company
restaurants_bars.description: A craft brewery and pub offering a selection of handcrafted beers and classic pub fare, located in the heart of downtown Seattle.

restaurants_bars.name: Serious Pie
restaurants_bars.description: A pizzeria by Tom Douglas featuring artisanal, wood-fired pizzas with a focus on gourmet toppings and unique combinations.

restaurants_bars.name: Elliot's Oyster House
restaurants_bars.address: 1201 Alaskan Way, Pier 56, Seattle, WA 98101, USA
restaurants_bars.description: Famous for its fresh oysters and seafood, Elliot's offers stunning views of Elliott Bay and a commitment to sustainable seafood.

restaurants_bars.name: Taylor Shellfish Oyster Bar
restaurants_bars.description: A casual spot specializing in fresh, locally-sourced oysters, clams, mussels, and other seafood delights.

restaurants_bars.name: Matt's in the Market
restaurants_bars.description: Overlooking the historic Pike Place Market, this restaurant offers Pacific Northwest cuisine with fresh, seasonal ingredients.

accommodations.name: Hyatt Regency Seattle
accommodations.description: The largest hotel in the Pacific Northwest, offering spacious rooms, several dining options, and a prime location near Climate Pledge Arena and other downtown attractions.

accommodations.name: The Edgewater Hotel
accommodations.description: A luxury waterfront hotel with unique rooms that offer spectacular views of Elliott Bay and the Olympic Mountains, close to Seattle's top attractions.

accommodations.name: Pan Pacific Seattle
accommodations.description: This upscale hotel features elegant rooms and suites, a fitness center, and is conveniently located near the Space Needle and Climate Pledge Arena.

accommodations.name: Hotel Andra
accommodations.description: A stylish boutique hotel with a Scandinavian theme, located in the heart of downtown Seattle, offering easy access to the city's most famous landmarks.

accommodations.name: Thompson Seattle
accommodations.description: A contemporary hotel offering stunning views of Puget Sound and the city skyline, featuring a rooftop bar and a prime location near Pike Place Market and Climate Pledge Arena.

tourist_attractions.name: Space Needle
tourist_attractions.description: Iconic landmark offering visitors panoramic views of downtown Seattle, Mount Rainier, Puget Sound, and the Olympic and Cascade Mountains.

tourist_attractions.name: Pike Place Market
tourist_attractions.description: Historic, bustling marketplace featuring a range of shops, flower stalls, and seafood markets, plus the original Starbucks cafe.

tourist_attractions.name: Museum of Pop Culture (MoPOP)
tourist_attractions.description: Museum dedicated to contemporary popular culture, featuring exhibits on music, science fiction, and pop culture.

tourist_attractions.name: Seattle Aquarium
tourist_attractions.description: Waterfront facility featuring marine life from the Pacific Northwest, including otters, octopus, and a large variety of fish.

tourist_attractions.name: Chihuly Garden and Glass
tourist_attractions.description: Exhibit showcasing the studio glass of Dale Chihuly. Features a Glasshouse, a lush garden, and intricate glass artwork.

tourist_attractions.name: Seattle Great Wheel
tourist_attractions.description: Giant Ferris wheel on the Seattle waterfront offering city and water views, especially beautiful at sunset.

tourist_attractions.name: Olympic Sculpture Park
tourist_attractions.description: Open-air sculpture park with works by renowned artists set against Puget Sound and the Olympic Mountains backdrop.

tourist_attractions.name: Woodland Park Zoo
tourist_attractions.address: 5500 Phinney Ave N, Seattle, WA 98103, USA
tourist_attractions.description: A 92-acre zoological garden dedicated to the conservation of wildlife, featuring animals from around the globe.

tourist_attractions.name: Discovery Park
tourist_attractions.address: 3801 Discovery Park Blvd, Seattle, WA 98199, USA
tourist_attractions.description: Seattle's largest city park offering hiking trails, sandy beaches, sea cliffs, and stunning views of Puget Sound and the Olympic Mountains.

tourist_attractions.name: Museum of Flight
tourist_attractions.address: 9404 E Marginal Way S, Seattle, WA 98108, USA
tourist_attractions.description: One of the largest air and space museums in the world, featuring an extensive collection of aircraft and spacecraft.

team_related_activities.name: Climate Pledge Arena Tours
team_related_activities.description: Join a guided tour of Climate Pledge Arena, home of the Seattle Kraken, to see behind-the-scenes areas and learn about the arena's state-of-the-art sustainability features.

team_related_activities.name: Kraken Team Store
team_related_activities.description: Visit the official team store located at Climate Pledge Arena to find all your Seattle Kraken gear, from jerseys and hats to unique memorabilia.

team_related_activities.name: Seattle Kraken Community Iceplex
team_related_activities.description: Explore the training facility of the Seattle Kraken, which also offers public skating, hockey leagues, and ice sports programs for all ages.

options.description: The Seattle Monorail provides a quick and convenient link between downtown Seattle and Climate Pledge Arena, with stations at Westlake Center and near the arena.
Seattle's King County Metro offers extensive bus service throughout the city, with multiple routes providing access to Climate Pledge Arena.

best_places_to_buy.name: Official Seattle Kraken Website
best_places_to_buy.description: The primary source for all Seattle Kraken ticket sales, offering a wide selection of seats and guaranteed authenticity.

best_places_to_buy.name: Ticketmaster
best_places_to_buy.description: Authorized ticketing partner for the Seattle Kraken, providing a secure platform for purchasing official tickets.

best_places_to_buy.name: StubHub
best_places_to_buy.description: A trusted secondary marketplace for Kraken tickets, offering a fanProtect guarantee for buyers.

ticket_purchasing_tips.ways_to_save: Buying tickets during the mid-week can often be cheaper than weekend games. Group ticket discounts often apply for groups of 10 or more. Some games may have last-minute ticket sales closer to the game day.
ticket_purchasing_tips.avoiding_scalpers: Always buy tickets from verified sources to avoid scams. If buying on the secondary market, ensure the website offers buyer guarantee. Avoid buying printed tickets from individuals on site as these can be duplicates or forgeries.
